text: I’m trying to build a module that shows rows from HubDB. But I want to allow the user to filter by category (an options-column in the hubDb table). Is this possible? Has anyone done anything similar?

Yes, you can follow <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-a-real-estate-listing-with-hubdb|this example> to make filtering stuff you need. you have to manipulate code based on your requirement :wink:

you can also use hubdb API
I see, this is in the template. I was hoping to get this list of options in the fields.json of the module, so my end user can select a filter. :thinking_face:
You mean you want to get all options from HubDB column to module field ?? if so then it’s not possible at the moment…curious why this needs to be happen ??
hello, can someone please tell me how to extract date,month,year from date field?
